question:
What is the output of the following Python code?

x = [1, 2, 3]
y = x
y.append(4)
print(x)

What will this JavaScript code log?

console.log(typeof null);

What will this SQL query return?

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE age > 30;
options: The total number of users in the table
The number of users whose age is greater than 30
